response.original_title: Battle for the Himalayas: The Fight to Film Everest
response.overview: Sir Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay were immortalized when they became the first humans to reach the summit of Mount Everest in 1953. But the Himalayas had gripped adventurers from around the world throughout the twentieth century and many were determined not just to reach its summits, but to capture the mountains on film.
response.title: Battle for the Himalayas: The Fight to Film Everest
